name: Study Buddies
description:
My Yuri Jam 2020 entry (only I procrastinated for nearly the two month time limit ^^;;)

Despite not getting to finish nearly as much of the original project idea I came up with in the 2 months I had for this game jam, I'm happy with this short but sweet story. I drafted it up with my friend Jordan's help over the last three days, and I'm always happy for the ren'py coding practice. I hope you enjoy~
